recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

asparagus 0.5 bunch
olive oil 1 tsp
dash seasoning 1 unit
Show Ingrendients Show All Steps

Estimated Time: 12 Minutes

Recipe:

Preheat ninja to 500° (Takes 8 minutes)
Add ½ bunch asparagus to a ninja
Brush asparagus with 1 tsp olive oil
Cook asparagus in ninja @ 500° (Takes 4 minutes)
Season asparagus with dash seasoning
FINISHED
